LanguageData.Parthive.label: Hive piece
LanguageData.Parthive.description: A part of an insectoid hive. Can no longer create bugs, but still partially functional and may be used to produce insect jelly.
LanguageData.Partpod.label: Glow pod part
LanguageData.Partpod.description: A part of a glow pod. Can be used to construct an insect jelly farm.
